annual_mpg_per_vehicle: 年度车辆每加仑英里数
tire_price_explanation: 请分别输入转向、驱动和拖车轮胎的重置价格。以下是原因：没有轮胎价格，我们无法计算您的年度轮胎成本和成本节省。
tire_runout_miles_explanation: 请在下面对应的字段输入轮胎运行英里数。以下是我们如何定义运行英里数：测量（以英里计）从装载轮胎开始到轮胎停用时结束。运行英里数可帮助您计算出年度英里成本。当我们计算出年度英里成本后，执行摘要将提供图形摘要，以帮助显示运行英里数和年度成本之间的影响
tire_runout_kilometers_explantion: 请在下面对应的字段输入轮胎运行公里数。以下是我们如何定义运行公里数：测量（以公里计）从装载轮胎开始到轮胎停用时结束。运行公里数可帮助您计算出年度公里成本。当我们计算出年度公里成本后，执行摘要将提供图形摘要，以帮助显示运行公里数和年度成本之间的影响
first _life_explanation: 将您当前的轮胎与一组推荐轮胎进行比较。
second_life_explantion: 如果您点击二次生命标签，您将可以考虑轮胎的第二次使用寿命，包括翻新。如果您在操作中混合使用新轮胎和翻新轮胎，则二次生命标签可能会有所帮助。
blended_average_explanation: 使用混合平均卷标自定义您的结果。混合平均卷标允许您根据一次生命和二次生命的混合模拟来自定义模拟。当您完成一次生命和二次生命模拟之后，通常默认情况下混合使用50％/50％，但是很容易通过修改这些数字以配合您的操作。
weight_savings_explanation: 如果在一次生命配置中选择了MICHELIN X One轮胎，将询问您是否要计算潜在的重量节省。我们会要求您提供更多有关您所运输内容的详细信息，以便您可以自定义视图，了解增加的有效载荷和收入增加之间的潜在影响。重量节省卷标是备选项，可跳过来完成模拟。
rolling_explanation: 您的当前轮胎配置中，基本滚动摩擦值将始终为100。100个基线测量值作为每项轮胎和整台车辆配置的参考
weight_savings_page_explanation: 想要看看通过切换到MICHELIN Xone轮胎可以增加多少额外的有效载荷？请提供更多详细信息，以计算您的潜在节省重量，并估计拖运更多的有效载荷所带来的额外收入。
additional_revenue_weight_savings: 您想计算从节省重量那获得的额外收入
cost_savings: 潜在最大的燃油和年度轮胎节省成本
fuel_tire_costs_current_tires: 燃油及轮胎年度成本：当前轮胎
proposed_tire_selection_vs_current_tire_: 推荐轮胎选择 对比 当前轮胎选择
proposed_fuel_consumption_savings: 节省的推荐燃油消耗量（升）
proposed_annual_fuel_cost_savings: 推荐的燃油年度节省成本（升）
proposed_tire_annual_cost_difference: 推荐轮胎的年度成本差异
proposed_fuel_and_tire_net_cost_savings: 推荐燃油和轮胎年度净节省成本
proposed_scenario_potential_whole_fleet: 推荐情景的潜在车队收入
potential_weight_savings_after_retrofit: 改造后的潜在节省重量
whole_fleet_additional_revenue_per_year: 整个车队的额外年收入
proposed_vs_current_annual_fue_and_tire_: 推荐 对比 当前年度燃油及轮胎成本比较
proposed_tire_est_fuel_price: 推荐轮胎 燃油价格
second_life_runout_kilometer: 二次生命运行公里数比较
second_life_runout_mile: 二次生命运行英里数比较
second_life_fleet_annual_cost_comparison: 二次生命车队年成本比较
annual_mpg_per_vehicle_first_letter_capi: 年度车辆每加仑英里数
graph_page_alert: 请查看图形页面，然后再转到信息输入页面
graph_page_go_overall_pages_alert: 请查看所有的图形页面，然后再转到信息输入页面
maximum_scenario_alert: 推荐情景的最大数量是2
select_wheel_alert: 选择一种车轮位置再继续
complete_scenario_alert: 完成此项情景再添加新的情景
scenario_incomplete_alert: 该情景尚未完成，请完成或删除它
home_alert_msg: 请完成所有项目再继续
trailer_tire_configuration: 挂车  轮胎  配置
fuel_tire_costs_proposed_tires: 燃油 & 年度轮胎成本： 建议轮胎
proposed_annual_fuel_cost_savings_gal: 建议年度  燃油节省
proposed_lifecycle_analysis_scenario_sum: 建议的生命周期分析方案
name: 名字
annual_kpg_per_vehicle: 单车年度百公里油耗 L/100km
annual_kpg_per_vehicle1: 单车年度百公里油耗 km/L
regional_urban_val: 长途，区域和城市 值的和为100
config_text: 车辆的燃油消耗和轮胎的里程寿命计算器得出的数值仅用于比较和参考。轮胎的滚动阻力系数是基于ISO28580之标准的转鼓测量值。实际上，车辆的燃油消耗和轮胎的里程寿命会随着轮胎气压的维护情况，车辆的机械状态，驾驶习惯，气候路况等条件而有所不同。需要更详细的信息，请向米其林卡客车轮胎客户经理咨询。
weight_saving_help_text: 「您想计算从节省重量那获得的额外收入？
email_incorrect: One or more email addresses are invalid
fuel_report_attached: Fuel and Mileage report is attached
addtional_email_input: Please enter any additional recipients’ e-Mail Ids (separated by ;):
quantity_of_fuel_saving_with_michelin_ti: PERCENTAGE (%) FUEL SAVINGS WITH MICHELIN TIRES
annual_fuel_bill_label: = fleet size trucks x current price of fuel x (annual (kilo meter (or) miles) per vehicle x annual (mpg miles per gallon (or) l/100km) per vehicle) /100)
note_label: Percentage (%) Fuel Savings with Michelin Tires: to be a user input field, with a validation rule of 20%
potential_fuel_saveing_label: = Annual Fuel Billx Percentage Fuel Savings with Michelin Tires
rolling_note: Note: Current total rolling resistance always be 100,-->Rolling Resistance
proposed_rolling_resistance_text: =Steer Tread RRx100x(numb steer value/numb of total tire) + Drive Tread RRx100x(numb drive value/numb of total tire) + Tire Tread RR x100x(numb tire value/numb of total tire) + Non driven RR x100x(numb non-driven value/numb of total tire)
current_tire_fuel_consume_text: = annual miles per vehicle x (annual mpg per vehicle / 100)
current_tire_fuel_consume_fleet: Current Tire fuel consumed whole Fleet
current_tire_fuel_consume_fleet_text: = current Tire Fuel Consumed x fleet size trucks
coefficient_fuel_consumption_text: = (Annual Km/100) x(l/ 100 km consumption - ((proposed RR – current RR) x this. Total RR Coe) x (Annual average load of truck x temp COE))
proposed_fuel_consumption_text: =Proposed Fuel Consumption Fleet = coefficient Fuel Consumption x fleet size trucks
fuel_cost_text: = Tire fuel consumed whole Fleet x price of fuel
tyre_cost_text1: = {(Steer Tire Price/Steer Runout km)xSteer Tire NumberxAnnual Km)
tyre_cost_text2: (Drive Tire Price/Drive Runout km)xDrive Tire NumberxAnnual Km) }
tyre_cost_text3: Fleet Size Trucks + ( Trailer Tire Price/Trailer Runout km)
tyre_cost_text5: Non-Driven Tire Price/Non-Driven Runout km)xNon-Driven Tire NumberxAnnual Km)
fuel_tire_cost: Fuel and Tire Annual Costs Whole Fleet
rr_label_text: =Steer RR Value x(Steer Tires/Total Tires) + Drive RR Valuex(Drive Tires/Total Tires) + Non-Driven RR Valuex(Non-Driven Tires/Total Tires) + Trailer RR Valuex(Trailer Tires/Total Tires)
fuel_consume_text: Proposed Fuel Consumed – Current Fuel Consumed
fuel_cost1_text: Proposed Fuel Cost – Current Fuel Cost
tire_cost1_text: Proposed Tire Cost– Current Tire Cost
tire_cost1_text1: Gap1 Tire Cost / Current Tire Cost x 100%

legalVariable: The fuel and mileage saving calculations shown are based on identified average values. Rolling resistance figures are determined by drum tests according to ISO 28580 procedures. Actual fuel consumption and mileage will vary due to factors such as air pressure maintenance, vehicle components, driver techniques, climate and road conditions and aerodynamics. For more information, please contact your Michelin representative.
